Reviews.Title: “do not stay here”
Reviews.Author: AnaOsorio
Reviews.Content: bad customer service smoking smelled terrible ion reception believe family visit stay worst welcome giving location value money presentation awful bed

Reviews.Title: “Good value for reasonable room in excellent location”
Reviews.Author: dodmic
Reviews.Content: spent nights gemini hotel booked online currently shuttle bus service airport public bus 400 takes 100m hotel 5 hotel renovation value offer check courteous helpful perfectly adequate encountered due renovations easy travel bus city centre eastern suburbs location plenty shops near hotel

Reviews.Title: “good thing it was only for one night.”
Reviews.Author: lalenawalter
Reviews.Content: booked expedia believe rated 3 star escorted elevator friendly cockroach clean cost 100night decorated sometime 70s hasnt changed process renovating maybe improvements staff friendly helpful near main hub sydney bus system easy inexpensive taxis pretty pricey expedia offered shuttle discontinued weeks prior arrival alright quick stop wouldnt stay
